ygData.msgSnippet: Shadow Wing is dead, well, her body is dead, but her spark is still in her body.  Lunerpine attached a cord from himself to her and then went in to stasis

Shadow Wing is dead, well, her body is dead, but her spark is still 
in her body.  Lunerpine attached a cord from himself to her and then 
went in to stasis lock.
